description: This file defines a UI component named 'Badge' using the LightningJS framework, implementing a simple pill with dynamic width based on the label text.

classes.name: Badge
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a badge with customizable label and color, with width adjusting based on label length.

methods.name: bg
methods.description: Computed property returning the background color, defaulting to a specific color if not provided.

methods.name: text
methods.description: Computed property converting the label to string for display.

methods.name: width
methods.description: Computed property determining the badge's width based on text length, constrained between 100 and 220 pixels.
